description:
The popularity of Data Science in the business world has exploded in
recent years as companies are realising the value that data can yield
to their products, services, and business decisions.

In this talk, we'll discuss a typical data science workflow, from
extracting the raw data through to serving real-time machine learning
predictions using a REST API.

We'll feature a range of Python tools that make up the Data Science
pipeline, including Pandas, Scikit-learn, Gensim, Luigi, and Flask, and
show how these all can work together.

A real-world implementation done at Offerzen will be presented as an
example.
title: Zen and the Art of Data Science
